005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.object.Date;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
012
013import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
014import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018public interface IDateItem extends ITemporalItem {
019
020  /**
021   * Construct a new date item using the provided string {@code value}.
022   *
023   * @param value
024   *          a string representing a date
025   * @return the new item
026   */
027  @NonNull
028  static IDateItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
029    try {
030      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE.parse(value));
031    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
032      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(String.format("Unable to parse string value '%s'", value), ex);
033    }
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Construct a new date item using the provided {@code value}.
038   *
039   * @param value
040   *          a date, without time zone information
041   * @return the new item
042   */
043  @NonNull
044  static IDateItem valueOf(@NonNull Date value) {
045    return new DateWithoutTimeZoneItemImpl(value);
046  }
047
048  /**
049   * Construct a new date item using the provided {@code value}.
050   *
051   * @param value
052   *          a date, with time zone information
053   * @return the new item
054   */
055  @NonNull
056  static IDateItem valueOf(@NonNull ZonedDateTime value) {
057    return new DateWithTimeZoneItemImpl(
058        // ignore time
059        ObjectUtils.notNull(value.truncatedTo(ChronoUnit.DAYS)));
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
064   *
065   * @param item
066   *          the item to cast
067   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
068   *         cast to this type
069   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
070   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
071   */
072  @NonNull
073  static IDateItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
074    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE.cast(item);
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  default IDateItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
079    return cast(item);
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
084    return compareTo(cast(item));
085  }
086}
